ground_truth: He turns and checks behind him. He turns back and lifts up the golden snitch bequeathed to him by Dumbledore. The writing on it appears. Harry studies it. He lifts the golden snitch to his mouth and presses it to his lips. The outer casing opens. The inner casing revolves to create an opening. Inside, a polished octagonal stone. On one surface, a circle is inscribed inside a triangle, down the middle of which is a line. The stone floats out of the snitch. Harry places the palm of his right hand under the floating stone. He carefully clenches his fist around it. His eyes are closed. Harry slowly opens them and stares ahead. In front of him stand his parents, with Sirius and Remus. Lily stretches out her hand. Harry goes to take it, but his hand passes right through hers. They gaze at each other. Lily lowers her hand. Lily smiles. Harry turns to Sirius and takes a few paces forward. Harry nods at his father, James. Harry turns and gazes at his mother, then moves towards her. He looks across at his father. Sirius points at Harry's heart. Once again, Harry's gaze lights upon his mother. Harry unclenches his fist. The Resurrection Stone falls gently onto the forest floor. Voldemort stands in a clearing in the forest. Voldemort opens his eyes and glares at the gaunt-faced Death Eater. Bellatrix Lestrange walks up behind Voldemort, who takes a few paces forward. He turns around. Bellatrix lowers her head reverentially as he passes her, the Elder Wand clasped in his right hand. He stops and half turns his head. Bellatrix peers through the gloom and sees Harry coming into the clearing. Voldemort flexes his neck and looks back over his shoulder. He turns to face Harry. Hagrid sees him. Voldemort stares at the teenager who stands unwavering in front of him. Nagini slithers past Hagrid towards Voldemort, who steadies himself and raises his wand. Harry stands, unflinching. Harry closes his eyes. A stream of green light flashes from the Elder Wand and hits Harry full on. Bright white light. Harry comes to. He's clean-shaven, unbruised, and without his spectacles. He stands silhouetted against a completely white background. Behind him in the whiteness, there's a small bench. He walks over to it and bends down to peer underneath the bench. He recoils when he sees a tiny, skeletal, red, raw naked figure curled up in a fetal position. Dumbledore steps towards him. Dumbledore wears a silvery white robe in the vista of white. Harry looks around. He glances back at the fetal figure. They stroll along the platform and sit down on a bench. Dumbledore gets to his feet.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He rotates and inspects behind him. He rotates back and raises up the golden snitch granted to him by Dumbledore. The inscription on it materializes. Harry examines it. He raises the golden snitch to his mouth and presses it to his lips. The outer shell opens. The inner shell pivots to form an aperture. Inside, a polished octagonal gem. On one facet, a circle is etched inside a triangle, down the center of which is a line. The gem levitates out of the snitch. Harry places the palm of his right hand beneath the levitating gem. He cautiously grips his fist around it. His eyes are shut. Harry slowly opens them and gazes forward. Ahead of him stand his parents, with Sirius and Remus. Lily extends her hand. Harry goes to seize it, but his hand passes directly through hers. They look at each other. Lily lowers her hand. Lily smiles. Harry turns to Sirius and takes a few strides forward. Harry nods at his father, James. Harry rotates and gazes at his mother, then advances towards her. He looks across at his father. Sirius indicates at Harry's heart. Once more, Harry's gaze rests upon his mother. Harry unclenches his fist. The Resurrection Stone descends softly onto the woodland ground. Voldemort stands in a glade in the woodland. Voldemort opens his eyes and glares at the hollow-faced Death Eater. Bellatrix Lestrange strides up behind Voldemort, who takes a few strides forward. He rotates around. Bellatrix lowers her head respectfully as he passes her, the Elder Wand gripped in his right hand. He halts and half rotates his head. Bellatrix peers through the murk and perceives Harry approaching the glade. Voldemort flexes his neck and gazes back over his shoulder. He rotates to confront Harry. Hagrid perceives him. Voldemort stares at the youth who stands resolute in front of him. Nagini glides past Hagrid towards Voldemort, who steadies himself and elevates his wand. Harry stands, unwavering. Harry shuts his eyes. A stream of emerald illumination flashes from the Elder Wand and strikes Harry full on. Brilliant white illumination. Harry regains consciousness. He's clean-shaven, unbruised, and without his spectacles. He stands silhouetted against a completely white backdrop. Behind him in the whiteness, there's a small bench. He strolls over to it and bends down to peer beneath the bench. He recoils when he perceives a tiny, skeletal, red, raw nude form curled up in a fetal posture. Dumbledore steps towards him. Dumbledore wears a silvery white robe in the panorama of white. Harry looks around. He glances back at the fetal form. They walk along the platform and sit down on a bench. Dumbledore gets to his feet.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: He turns and checks behind him. The golden snitch, bequeathed to him by Dumbledore, is turned back to and lifted up by him. The writing on it appears. It is studied by Harry. The golden snitch is lifted to his mouth and pressed to his lips by him. The outer casing is opened. The inner casing revolves to create an opening. Inside, there is a polished octagonal stone. On one surface, a circle is inscribed inside a triangle, down the middle of which is a line. The stone floats out of the snitch. The palm of his right hand is placed under the floating stone by Harry. It is carefully clenched around by him. His eyes are closed. They are slowly opened by Harry, and he stares ahead. In front of him, his parents stand, with Sirius and Remus. Her hand is stretched out by Lily. Harry goes to take it, but his hand passes right through hers. Each other is gazed at by them. Her hand is lowered by Lily. She smiles. Sirius is turned to by Harry, and a few paces forward are taken. His father, James, is nodded at by Harry. His mother is gazed at by Harry as he turns, then she is moved towards by him. Across, he looks at his father. Harry's heart is pointed at by Sirius. Once again, his mother is gazed at by Harry. His fist is unclenched by him. Onto the forest floor, the Resurrection Stone is gently fallen by Harry. In a clearing in the forest stands Voldemort. His eyes are opened by Voldemort, and the gaunt-faced Death Eater is glared at. Behind Voldemort walks Bellatrix Lestrange, who is taken a few paces forward by him. Around, he is turned by him. Her head is lowered reverentially by Bellatrix as she is passed by him, the Elder Wand clasped in his right hand. He stops and his head is half turned. Through the gloom peers Bellatrix and sees Harry coming into the clearing. His neck is flexed by Voldemort and his shoulder is looked back over. Harry is turned to face by him. He is seen by Hagrid. The teenager, who stands unwavering in front of him, is stared at by Voldemort. Past Hagrid, Nagini slithers towards Voldemort, who steadies himself and raises his wand. Harry remains unflinching. His eyes are closed by him. From the Elder Wand, a stream of green light flashes and Harry is hit full on. Bright white light. Harry comes to. He is clean-shaven, unbruised, and without his spectacles. A completely white background silhouettes him. There's a small bench behind him in the whiteness. It is walked over to and bent down to peer underneath by him. He recoils when a tiny, skeletal, red, raw naked figure curled up in a fetal position is seen by him. Towards him steps Dumbledore. A silvery white robe is worn by Dumbledore in the vista of white. Around, Harry looks. The fetal figure is glanced back at by him. They stroll along the platform and sit down on a bench. To his feet gets Dumbledore.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He checks behind him, then lifts the golden snitch given by Dumbledore. The writing appears, and Harry studies it. He presses the snitch to his lips, opening it to reveal a polished octagonal stone with a circle inscribed inside a triangle and line. The stone floats out, and Harry places his palm under it, clenching his fist around it. With closed eyes, he opens them to see his parents, Sirius, and Remus. Lily extends her hand, but Harry's attempt to take it fails as it passes through. They gaze at each other, and Lily smiles. Harry approaches Sirius and nods at James, his father, while Sirius points at Harry's heart. Harry unclenches his fist, dropping the Resurrection Stone onto the forest floor. Voldemort stands in a forest clearing, glaring at a Death Eater. Bellatrix Lestrange approaches, reverently lowering her head as Voldemort passes, holding the Elder Wand. Bellatrix sees Harry entering the clearing, and Voldemort faces him. Hagrid notices Harry standing bravely as Nagini slithers by. Voldemort raises his wand, and a green light from the Elder Wand hits Harry. A bright white light flashes, and Harry comes to, unblemished and without spectacles. In a white background, he stands by a bench, peering underneath to see a tiny, skeletal figure curled up. Dumbledore, in a silvery white robe, steps toward Harry. They stroll along a platform and sit on a bench before Dumbledore stands up.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description:
He checks behind him, then lifts the golden snitch from Dumbledore. Writing appears as Harry studies it, pressing it to his lips. The casing opens, revealing an octagonal stone inscribed with a circle in a triangle. The stone floats out. Harry's hand grasps it. With closed eyes, he opens them to see his parents, Sirius, and Remus. Harry reaches for Lily, but his hand passes through hers. They gaze at one another as she smiles. Harry nods at James and moves towards Lily. Sirius points at Harry's heart. Harry releases the Resurrection Stone onto the forest floor. 

Voldemort stands in the forest, glaring at a Death Eater. Bellatrix approaches as Voldemort advances with the Elder Wand. Spotting Harry, Bellatrix lowers her head. Voldemort faces Harry. Hagrid watches as Nagini slithers past. Voldemort raises his wand, and Harry stands resolute, closing his eyes. A green light from the wand hits Harry. In a white realm, Harry is clean-shaven and spectacle-free. He sees a skeletal, red figure under a bench. Dumbledore, in a silvery robe, approaches. They walk and sit together. Dumbledore stands.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
He swiftly turns his head to glance behind him, ensuring everything is as it should be. Reassured, he turns back and gently lifts the golden snitch, which had been bequeathed to him, a precious gift from Dumbledore himself. As he holds it, the mysterious writing on its surface gradually becomes visible. Harry studies the text intently, trying to understand its meaning. With great care, he brings the golden snitch closer, lifting it to his mouth before pressing it softly against his lips. This action triggers the mechanism; the outer casing opens smoothly, and the inner casing begins to rotate, revealing a small opening. Within this hidden compartment lies a polished, octagonal stone. Engraved onto one of its surfaces is a symbol of profound significance: a circle inscribed within a triangle, intersected by a straight line. The stone itself gracefully floats out from the snitch's confines. Slowly and with deliberate caution, Harry places the palm of his right hand beneath the floating, enchanted stone. He carefully closes his fist around it as he closes his eyes, a moment of contemplation. When Harry gently reopens them, his gaze is fixed forward. Standing before him are the familiar and comforting figures of his parents, accompanied by Sirius and Remus. Lily, with tenderness in her eyes, stretches out her hand towards him. Harry moves to take it, but his fingers pass through hers, revealing the ethereal nature of their connection. They share a poignant gaze. Lily then lowers her hand, offering him a reassuring smile. Harry turns his attention to Sirius, taking several steps forward in acknowledgment. He nods respectfully at his father, James, before once more turning his gaze to his beloved mother and stepping closer. He then looks over to his father again. Sirius gestures meaningfully towards Harry’s heart. Harry's gaze returns to his mother, filled with emotion. Slowly, he unclenches his fist, allowing the Resurrection Stone to fall gently onto the forest floor below. In the distance, Voldemort stands within a clearing in the dark and foreboding forest. He opens his eyes, casting a critical glare at the gaunt-faced Death Eater nearby. Bellatrix Lestrange approaches from behind, her demeanor reverent as she nears Voldemort, who strides forward a few paces before turning sharply. Bellatrix lowers her head in deep reverence as he passes, the infamous Elder Wand held firmly in his right hand. He halts, half-turning his head to peer through the gloom. Bellatrix peers into the dimness, catching sight of Harry as he makes his way into the clearing. Voldemort flexes his neck slightly, glancing back over his shoulder before facing Harry, who is now clearly visible. From a distance, Hagrid observes him, taking in the scene. Voldemort stares intently at the unwavering, young teenager standing resolute before him. Nagini, the serpent, slithers past Hagrid towards Voldemort, moving with a sinister grace as Voldemort steadies himself and raises his powerful wand. Despite the imminent danger, Harry stands steady and unflinching. Closing his eyes with determination, he prepares for what is to come. In an instant, a blinding stream of green light bursts forth from the Elder Wand, striking Harry directly. A brilliant flash of white light engulfs everything. 

When Harry regains consciousness, he finds himself in a curious state; he is clean-shaven, unbruised, and noticeably missing his spectacles. He stands silhouetted against an unbroken expanse of white, the background completely enveloping him in its starkness. Behind him, within the vast whiteness, he notices a small, unassuming bench. Intrigued, he walks over to it, leaning down to peer underneath. He recoils slightly upon discovering a tiny, skeletal figure, red and raw, curled up in a fetal position, a sight both unsettling and pitiful. At this moment, Dumbledore steps forward from the whiteness, adorned in a flowing silvery white robe that complements the tranquil vista. Harry looks around, absorbing his unusual surroundings. He casts a glance back at the pitiable fetal figure before they both begin to stroll together along what appears to be a platform. Eventually, they come to rest and sit down on a bench. After a while, Dumbledore rises to his feet, ready to guide Harry onwards.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
With quick and decisive movements, he swiftly swivels his head to glance back over his shoulder, ensuring that everything behind him remains just as it should be. Feeling reassured and at ease with what he sees, he turns back around. In a slow and deliberate gesture, he gently lifts the exquisite golden snitch before him, a treasured and significant artifact that had been bequeathed to him as a precious gift from Dumbledore himself. As he securely holds the snitch in his hand, he watches with focused attention as the mysterious writing etched upon its surface gradually comes into view. Harry scrutinizes the text with intense concentration, striving to decipher and comprehend its deeper meaning. Exercising the utmost care and precision, he brings the delicate golden snitch closer to himself, thoughtfully lifting it to his mouth before softly pressing it against his lips. This particular action activates the concealed mechanism within; the outer casing unfolds with fluidity and grace, while the inner casing begins to rotate, gradually revealing a small, hidden compartment. Nestled within this clandestine chamber lies a polished stone, exquisitely shaped in an octagonal form. Engraved upon one of its surfaces is a symbol rich with profound significance: a circle enclosed within a triangle, intersected by a single, straight line. The stone, with an almost ethereal quality, starts to float effortlessly out from the confines of the snitch. With slow and deliberate caution, Harry places his open palm of the right hand beneath the gently floating, enchanted stone. He closes his fist around it carefully, his eyes closing in a moment of intense contemplation. When Harry gradually reopens his eyes, his gaze remains fixed resolutely forward. Standing before him are the comforting and familiar figures of his parents, warmly accompanied by Sirius and Remus. Lily, with a tender and loving expression in her eyes, gently extends her hand towards him. Harry instinctively moves to grasp it, only for his fingers to pass through hers, revealing the ethereal and intangible nature of their connection. They share an intense and poignant gaze. Lily then gently lowers her hand, offering Harry a reassuring and warm smile. Harry then turns his attentive focus to Sirius, taking several deliberate steps forward in acknowledgment and respect. He nods respectfully at his father, James, before once again redirecting his gaze to his beloved mother and stepping closer to her. Finally, he glances over to his father again. Sirius makes a meaningful gesture towards Harry’s heart, prompting Harry to return his gaze to his mother, filled with deep emotion. Slowly and with great care, he unclenches his fist, allowing the Resurrection Stone to fall lightly and gently onto the forest floor below. Off in the distance, Voldemort stands menacingly within a clearing in the dark and imposing forest. He opens his eyes, directing a piercing and critical glare at the gaunt-featured Death Eater positioned nearby. Bellatrix Lestrange approaches from behind with a demeanour of deep reverence as she nears Voldemort, who strides forward a few paces important steps before sharply turning. Bellatrix lowers her head in a gesture of deep reverence as he passes, with the infamous Elder Wand held firmly and decisively in his right hand. He halts momentarily, half-turning his head to peer through the enveloping gloom of the forest. Bellatrix peers into the dimness as well, catching sight of Harry as he makes his way into the clearing. Voldemort flexes his neck slightly, casting a glance back over his shoulder before once again facing Harry, who is now clearly visible. From a distance, Hagrid observes him, taking in and absorbing the scene unfolding before him. Voldemort directs an intense and unwavering stare at the steadfast young teenager who stands resolute before him. Nagini, the sinister serpent, slithers past Hagrid, moving with a foreboding grace towards Voldemort, who steadies himself and confidently raises his powerful wand. Despite the immediate and imminent danger surrounding him, Harry stands firm, steady, and unflinching. Closing his eyes with determination and resolve, he readies himself for what is about to come. In an instant, a blinding, brilliant stream of green light bursts forth from the Elder Wand, striking Harry directly. A brilliant flash of white light engulfs everything around. 

When Harry eventually regains consciousness, he finds himself in a curious and surreal state; he is entirely clean-shaven, free of any bruises, and noticeably missing his usual spectacles. He stands silhouetted against an unbroken, endless expanse of white, the background completely enveloping and surrounding him in its starkness. Behind him, amidst the vast whiteness, he notices a small, unassuming bench. Intrigued and curious, he walks over to it, leaning down carefully to peer underneath. He recoils slightly, taken aback upon discovering a tiny, skeletal figure, raw and red, curled up tightly in a fetal position—a sight that is both unsettling and pitiful. At that very moment, Dumbledore emerges gently forward from the whiteness, adorned in a flowing, silvery white robe that beautifully complements the tranquil and serene vista around them. Harry takes a moment to look around, absorbing and taking in his unusual and unfamiliar surroundings. He casts a glance back at the pitiable fetal figure before they both begin to stroll together along what appears to be a platform. Eventually, at a certain point, they come to rest and sit down on a bench. After spending some time in quiet reflection, Dumbledore rises to his feet, ready and prepared to guide Harry onwards towards what awaits.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He turns cautiously and checks behind him, scanning the area to ensure that he is alone or perhaps simply out of instinctive vigilance. Satisfied, he turns back, feeling a sense of purpose as he lifts up the golden snitch, which had been bequeathed to him by Dumbledore. As his eyes focus intently on its surface, the writing on the snitch becomes visible, prompting Harry to study the message with a deep concentration. He then lifts the golden snitch to his mouth, bringing it close to his lips and presses it gently against them. The outer casing of the snitch opens in response to the contact, revealing an inner casing that begins to revolve methodically, creating an opening. Inside this opening lies a polished octagonal stone, on which Harry notices an inscription—a circle inside a triangle with a line running down the middle. Mesmerized, Harry watches as the stone floats out of the snitch, defying gravity. He instinctively places the palm of his right hand under the floating stone, offering it a resting place. With great care, he clenches his fist around it, feeling its weight and texture, while his eyes close, perhaps in reflection or preparation for what he knows is to come. Slowly, deliberately, he opens his eyes and stares ahead with clear intent. Before him stand the familiar, dearly missed figures of his parents, joined by Sirius and Remus, their presence ethereal yet comforting. Lily reaches out a hand towards him, a gesture filled with warmth and longing. Harry moves to take her hand, but his own passes through hers, a poignant reminder of the divide between their worlds. They gaze at each other in silent understanding, and Lily eventually lowers her hand, offering him a gentle, reassuring smile that speaks volumes. Harry turns his attention to Sirius, taking a few determined steps forward to acknowledge him. With a respectful nod, he greets his father, James, looking for a brief moment at the man he has always admired. Then, with a fondness that only a son can have for his mother, Harry turns to gaze at Lily once more, stepping towards her, holding her image in his heart. He looks across at his father, taking in the sight of his family. As Sirius points towards Harry's heart, the moment's significance deepens. Once again, Harry's eyes settle on his mother's comforting visage. With a resolution that feels right, he unclenches his fist, releasing the Resurrection Stone, which falls gently onto the forest floor. At that moment elsewhere, Voldemort stands amidst a clearing in the forest, seemingly poised and plotting. He opens his eyes, glaring with malice at the gaunt-faced Death Eater who stands nearby. Bellatrix Lestrange approaches from behind with reverence, as Voldemort takes a few paces forward, exuding authority. Turning around with a deliberate motion, he passes Bellatrix, who lowers her head reverentially, acknowledging the power he wields with the Elder Wand clasped in his authoritative right hand. He pauses and half turns his head, assessing the situation as Bellatrix peers through the forest's gloom and catches sight of Harry emerging into the clearing. Voldemort flexes his neck, maintaining his composure, and looks back over his shoulder with a calculating gaze before turning to face the young man who dares to stand before him. Hagrid, too, sees Harry, the boy he has watched over for so long. Voldemort stares at the teenager who stands unwavering, showing neither fear nor hesitation. As Nagini slithers past Hagrid towards Voldemort, who looks to steady himself, he raises his wand in preparation for the inevitable confrontation. Harry remains unflinching, a testament to his courage and resolve. He closes his eyes, perhaps in acceptance or defiance, as a stream of green light erupts from the Elder Wand, striking him fully. In an instant, everything is consumed by a bright white light. When Harry comes to, he finds himself remarkably unscathed, clean-shaven, and without the burden of his spectacles, as he stands silhouetted against a backdrop of complete and overwhelming whiteness. Behind him, amidst this vast emptiness, he notices a small bench, an incongruous object in the sea of white. Curiosity piqued, he walks over to it and bends down, peering underneath with cautious interest. He recoils suddenly, as his eyes register a tiny, skeletal, red, raw naked figure curled defensively in a fetal position, the sight unsettling and mysterious. It is then that Dumbledore steps forward, his presence a comforting familiarity in this surreal landscape, wearing a silvery white robe that blends seamlessly into the vista of white. Harry takes in his surroundings, glancing back at the fetal figure with a mix of intrigue and trepidation. Together, they stroll along what seems to be a platform, the environment surreal yet tangible, and they sit down on a bench, sharing a moment of calm amidst the uncertainty. After a while, Dumbledore rises to his feet, his actions deliberate and meaningful.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
Harry checks behind him and then lifts the golden snitch given to him by Dumbledore, revealing writing that he studies. As he presses the snitch to his lips, it opens to reveal a polished octagonal stone inscribed with a symbol. The stone floats out, and Harry catches it in his palm, closing his eyes before opening them to see his parents, Sirius, and Remus. He reaches for his mother's hand but his hand passes through hers, leading to a shared understanding as she smiles. Harry acknowledges his father with a nod and moves towards his mother, exchanging meaningful glances with Sirius who gestures towards Harry's heart. Harry releases the Resurrection Stone, letting it fall to the forest floor.

In a forest clearing, Voldemort, holding the Elder Wand, eyes the gaunt-faced Death Eater before acknowledging Bellatrix Lestrange, who shows deference as he passes. Spotting Harry, Voldemort turns to face the unyielding teenager, while Nagini slithers past Hagrid towards them. Voldemort raises his wand, unleashing a flash of green light that hits Harry, who stands unflinching before closing his eyes.

Harry awakens in a bright white space, appearing rejuvenated and without glasses. He explores the area, discovering a small bench under which lies a tiny, skeletal, red figure. Dumbledore approaches in a silvery robe, leading Harry to sit and talk on a bench before Dumbledore stands, signaling a transition.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He turns and checks behind him, perhaps recalling his many encounters with danger in the Forbidden Forest of Hogwarts. He turns back and lifts up the golden snitch bequeathed to him by Dumbledore, the former headmaster known for his wisdom and eccentricity. The writing on it appears, coded instructions intended for the one who seeks the truth. Harry studies it, understanding its significance as a key to facing his destiny. He lifts the golden snitch to his mouth and presses it to his lips, the gesture activating its secret mechanism. The outer casing opens, a design perfected over centuries by magical craftsmen. The inner casing revolves to create an opening, revealing its hidden treasure. Inside, a polished octagonal stone known as the Resurrection Stone, one of the three fabled Deathly Hallows. On one surface, a circle is inscribed inside a triangle, down the middle of which is a line, the symbol of the Hallows that represents the quest for mastery over death. The stone floats out of the snitch, responding to the magic it holds. Harry places the palm of his right hand under the floating stone, aware of the immense power it offers. He carefully clenches his fist around it, invoking the presence of those who have passed. His eyes are closed, a moment of reunion and reflection. Harry slowly opens them and stares ahead. In front of him stand his parents, with Sirius and Remus, figures of love and guidance lost to him too soon. Lily stretches out her hand, her presence as vivid and comforting as ever. Harry goes to take it, but his hand passes right through hers, revealing the bittersweet nature of their meeting. They gaze at each other, unspoken words passing between them. Lily lowers her hand, acknowledging the boundary between life and death. Lily smiles, her expression full of pride and love. Harry turns to Sirius and takes a few paces forward, feeling the warmth of friendship and loyalty. Harry nods at his father, James, a silent communication of mutual respect and understanding. Harry turns and gazes at his mother, then moves towards her, drawing strength from her presence. He looks across at his father, the image of who he is and who he might become. Sirius points at Harry's heart, reminding him of the bravery and love that define him. Once again, Harry's gaze lights upon his mother, the bond between them unbroken by time or loss. Harry unclenches his fist, releasing the power he holds. The Resurrection Stone falls gently onto the forest floor, its purpose fulfilled, a testament to the choices made by those who seek peace rather than power. Voldemort stands in a clearing in the forest, a place of ancient magic and impending confrontation. Voldemort opens his eyes and glares at the gaunt-faced Death Eater, a loyal follower of his dark ambitions. Bellatrix Lestrange walks up behind Voldemort, who takes a few paces forward, exuding an air of menace and control. He turns around, his presence commanding fear and obedience. Bellatrix lowers her head reverentially as he passes her, the Elder Wand clasped in his right hand, a notorious artifact of immense destructive power. He stops and half turns his head, feeling the tension of the moment. Bellatrix peers through the gloom and sees Harry coming into the clearing, a lone figure facing overwhelming odds. Voldemort flexes his neck and looks back over his shoulder, sensing the gravity of the confrontation. He turns to face Harry, aware of the rivalry that has defined both their lives. Hagrid sees him, his heart heavy with concern and hope for the boy he has watched grow. Voldemort stares at the teenager who stands unwavering in front of him, an unexpected symbol of defiance and courage. Nagini, Voldemort's faithful serpent companion, slithers past Hagrid towards Voldemort, who steadies himself and raises his wand, ready for what might be the final battle. Harry stands, unflinching, his resolve unbroken by fear. Harry closes his eyes, accepting whatever fate has in store. A stream of green light flashes from the Elder Wand and hits Harry full on, a spell known as the Killing Curse, meant to end life instantly. Bright white light follows, an unexpected turn of events. Harry comes to, he's clean-shaven, unbruised, and without his spectacles, a transformation suggestive of rebirth. He stands silhouetted against a completely white background, a symbolic space representing transition. Behind him in the whiteness, there's a small bench, an ordinary object in an extraordinary place. He walks over to it and bends down to peer underneath the bench, curiosity piqued by the unknown. He recoils when he sees a tiny, skeletal, red, raw naked figure curled up in a fetal position, a disturbing vision of vulnerability and pain, the consequence of dark deeds. Dumbledore steps towards him, his presence reassuring and wise, the mentor he has always been. Dumbledore wears a silvery white robe in the vista of white, a figure of peace and guidance in this surreal place. Harry looks around, taking in the strange tranquility. He glances back at the fetal figure, a reminder of choices and their consequences. They stroll along the platform, a journey of reflection and understanding, and sit down on a bench, sharing a moment of clarity and reassurance. Dumbledore gets to his feet, ready to impart the final pieces of advice to his young protege.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: He turns and checks behind him. He turns back and lifts up the golden snitch bequeathed to him by Dumbledore. The writing on it appears. Harry studies it. He lifts the golden snitch to his mouth and presses it to his lips. The outer casing opens. The inner casing revolves to create an opening Inside a polished octagonal stone. On one surface a circle is inscribed inside a triangle down the middle of which is a line. The stone floats out of the snitch. Harry places the palm of his right hand under the floating stone. He carefully clenches his fist around it. His eyes are closed. Harry slowly opens them and stares ahead. In front of him stand his parents with Sirius and Remus. Lily stretches out her hand. Harry goes to take it but his hand passes right through hers. They gaze at each other. Lily lowers her hand. Lily smiles. Harry turns to Sirius and takes a few paces forward. Harry nods at his father James. Harry turns and gazes at his mother then moves towards her. He looks across at his father. Sirius points at Harry's heart. Once again Harry's gaze lights upon his mother. Harry unclenches his fist. The Resurrection Stone falls gently onto the forest floor. Voldemort stands in a clearing in the forest. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Voldemort opens his eyes and glares at the gauntfaced Death Eater. Bellatrix Lestrange walks up behind Voldemort who takes a few paces forward. He turns around. Bellatrix lowers her head reverentially as he passes her. the Elder Wand clasped in his right hand. He stops and half turns his head. Bellatrix peers through the gloom and sees Harry coming into the clearing. Voldemort flexes his neck and looks back over his shoulder. He turns to face Harry. Hagrid sees him. Voldemort stares at the teenager who stands unwavering in front of him. Nagini slithers past Hagrid towards Voldemort who steadies himself and raises his wand. Harry stands unflinching. Harry closes his eyes. A stream of green light flashes from the Elder Wand and hits Harry full on. Bright white light. Harry comes to. He is cleanshaven unbruised and without his spectacles. He stands silhouetted against a completely white background. Behind him in the whiteness there is a small bench. He walks over to it and bends down to peer underneath the bench. He recoils when he sees a tiny skeletal red raw naked figure curled up in a fetal position. Dumbledore steps towards him. Dumbledore wears a silvery white robe. in the vista of white. Harry looks around. He glances back at the fetal figure. They stroll along the platform and sit down on a bench. Dumbledore gets to his feet.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: He turns and checks behind him. He turns back and lifts up the golden snitch bequeathed to him by Dumbledore. The writing on it appears. Harry studies it. He lifts the golden snitch to his mouth and presses it to his lips. The outer casing opens. The inner casing revolves to create an opening Inside a polished octagonal stone. On one surface a circle is inscribed inside a triangle down the middle of which is a line. The stone floats out of the snitch. Harry places the palm of his right hand under the floating stone. He carefully clenches his fist around it. His eyes are closed. Harry slowly opens them and stares ahead. In front of him stand his parents with Sirius and Remus. Lily stretches out her hand. Harry goes to take it but his hand passes right through hers. They gaze at each other. Lily lowers her hand. Lily smiles. Harry turns to Sirius and takes a few paces forward. Harry nods at his father James. Harry turns and gazes at his mother then moves towards her. He looks across at his father. Sirius points at Harry's heart. Once again Harry's gaze lights upon his mother. Harry unclenches his fist. The Resurrection Stone falls gently onto the forest floor. Voldemort stands in a clearing in the forest. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The cat pivots and peeks beneath it. The cat spins back and hoists up the shimmering pebble gifted to it by Gandalf. The etchings on it emerge. The feline examines it. It raises the pebble to its ear and taps it against its cheek. The outer shell splits open. The inner casing rotates to form a gap. Inside, a gleaming hexagonal beetle. On one side, a square is carved inside a rectangle, down the center of which is a squiggle. The beetle drifts out of the pebble. The cat places the tip of its right paw beneath the levitating beetle. It cautiously wraps its claws around it. Its eyes are sealed shut. The feline gradually opens them and glances forward. Before it stand its siblings, with Frodo and Samwise. Nala extends her paw. The cat reaches to grasp it, but its paw slips through hers. They watch each other. Nala retracts her paw. Nala grins. The feline turns to Frodo and takes a few strides onward. It bows to its brother, Simba. The cat spins and gawks at its sister, then marches towards her. It peers across at its brother. Frodo gestures towards the cat's tail. Once more, its gaze settles upon its sister. The cat unfurls its paw. The Beetle of Life drops softly onto the jungle floor. Saruman stands in a meadow in the jungle. Saruman shuts his eyes and scowls at the sallow-faced Goblin. Bellatrix Lestrange sneaks up behind Saruman, who takes a few leaps onward. He spins around. Bellatrix bows her head devoutly as he glides past her, the Mystic Staff gripped in his left hand. He pauses and swivels his head slightly. Bellatrix squints through the haze and spots the feline entering the meadow. Saruman tilts his head and looks back over his elbow. He turns to confront the feline. Aragorn spots it. Saruman glowers at the kitten who stands unfalteringly before him. Smaug slinks past Aragorn towards Saruman, who braces himself and lowers his staff. The cat stands, unwavering. It shuts its eyes. A blaze of purple light bursts from the Mystic Staff and strikes the cat head-on. Dazzling orange light. The cat awakens. It's fluffy, untouched, and lacking its collar. It stands silhouetted against an entirely orange background. Behind it in the orange, there's a small table. It strolls over to it and crouches to peek beneath the table. It flinches when it notices a minuscule, bony, amber, raw featherless creature curled up in a fetal pose. Elrond strides towards it. Elrond wears a silky white garment in the scene of orange. The cat scans the area. It glances back at the featherless creature. They wander along the deck and settle on a table. Elrond rises to his toes.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Harry examines a golden snitch left to him by Dumbledore, revealing an octagonal stone with a symbol inscribed on it. Upon opening the snitch and holding the stone, Harry sees his parents, Sirius, and Remus appear before him. Although he tries to reach them, his hand passes through. After a poignant moment, Harry drops the Resurrection Stone to the ground. Voldemort stands in a forest clearing, holding the Elder Wand as Harry approaches, unfazed. As Voldemort casts a spell, Harry is hit by a green light. He awakens in a bright, white space, unharmed, and notices a small, frail figure under a bench. Dumbledore arrives, dressed in a silvery robe. Harry and Dumbledore walk along a platform and converse before Dumbledore stands to leave.
